name: Singleplayer Chess VR
description:
There is no multiplayer, it's just a pointless physics sim.

This is literally just the game we made for the Games Factory Jam yesterday except instead of lasers there is a chess board. Hold trigger to pickup objects. Eventually I will get the hang of VR and make a decent game.

Tested with Vive in Windows. Made for Chess Jam 2018

CREDITS:
Game by Teh_Bucket
Music by Blackavar https://musescore.com/blackavar
Soundtrack:
https://musescore.com/blackavar/gymnosolitude-6
